meanings.definition: A type of marine gastropod mollusk that lacks a shell and has gills on the posterior part of the body.
meanings.sent1: Opisthobranchs are sea creatures without shells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study opisthobranchs to learn about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The opisthobranchs had a party and left their shells at home!
meanings.sent4: In the ocean, opisthobranchs dance gracefully without burden of a shell.
meanings.sent5: Children love learning about opisthobranchs because they are shell-less mollusks.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Opisthobranchia, a subclass of gastropod mollusks.
meanings.sent1: Opisthobranchs belong to the subclass Opisthobranchia.
meanings.sent2: The diversity of opisthobranchs is fascinating to marine biologists.
meanings.sent3: At the underwater school, the opisthobranchs were the cool kids in class.
meanings.sent4: In the family of mollusks, opisthobranchs are the colorful gems.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium showcased a stunning collection of opisthobranchs from around the world.
